console.name: console
console.description: :boom: Best minimal console (symfony/console) to Nette Framework (@nette)

last.name: v0.4
last.body:
Bump! ðŸ”© 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/console/compare/v0.3...v0.4

Changes:
- commands can be register in non-sapi mode [#14][#12]
- tune QA:
  - phpstan
  - codesnffer
  - Travis stages 

-----

BC break:

```
extensions:
    console: Contributte\Console\DI\ConsoleExtension 
```

to 

```yaml
extensions:
    console: Contributte\Console\DI\ConsoleExtension(%consoleMode%) 
```

api.name: api
api.description: [Moved to @apitte] Powerful API to Nette Framework

last.name: v0.3
last.body:
Bump! ðŸ”ª 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/api/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3

Changes:
 - namespace refactoring (drop Bridges)
 - rename Factory/Generator to Serialization
 - rename Validators to Validations
 - ApiResponse/ApiRequest don't composite PSR7, they extend
 - simplify whole middlewares usage
 - simplify ApiExtension
 - added new Api2MiddlewaresExtension to easy use of middlewares
 - simplify Transformers (from 2 interfaces to 1 interface)
 - direct dependencies: contributte/psr7-http-message, contributte/middlewares, contributte/phpdoc
 - tiny micro refactorings
 - added huge amount of tests

last.name: v0.3
last.body:
Bumped! ðŸ‘œ 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/application/compare/v0.2...v0.3

Changes:
- acquire [ublaboo/responses](https://github.com/ublaboo/responses) [#12] (thanks @paveljanda)
- added NullControl, NullComponet [#9][#10]
- added StructuredTemplates (thanks @benijo)

last.name: v0.3
last.body:
Bump! :abcd: 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/bootstrap/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3

Changes:

- pluggable configurator [#2] 
- ability to detect debug mode by file [#4] 
- PHP 5.6 -> PHP 7.1 [#5] [#6] 

BC break:

You have to enable ENV parsing explicit.

Before:

```php
$configurator = new ExtraConfigurator();
```

After

```php
$configurator = new ExtraConfigurator();
$configurator->setEnvDebugMode();
```

facebook.name: facebook
facebook.description: :yum: Tiny Facebook SDK 5.x integration to Nette Framework

last.name: v0.2
last.body:
Bump! :1st_place_medal: 

Diff: [v0.1...v0.2](https://github.com/contributte/facebook/compare/v0.1...v0.2)

Changes:
* `Facebook` and `FacebookFactory` are now services
* Default usage of session PersistentDataHandler + session autostart
* You can now specify `state` parameter in `FacebookLogin::getLoginUrl()`
* `defaultGraphVersion` and `persistentDataHandler` added as options

neonizer.name: neonizer
neonizer.description: :wrench: Collection of useful scripts for manipulaton with NEON files. Support composer pre-install / post-install events. Set/get parameters, validate files.

last.name: v0.2
last.body:
Bump! :tada: 

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/neonizer/compare/v0.1...v0.2

Changes:
- internal refactoring
- PHP 7.1 [#3]
- support more commands:
  - validate (thanks @jiripudil) [#2] [#1]
  - set

-----

```json
"scripts": {
    "set-config": [
      "Contributte\\Neonizer\\NeonizerExtension::set"
    ]
}
```

Then run:

```sh
composer set-config -- $(pwd)/app/config/config.local.neon --database.host=localhost --database.user=neonizer
```

Do you like **environment variables**? 


```sh
composer set-config -- $(pwd)/app/config/config.local.neon --database.host=$DATABASE_HOST --database.user=$DATABASE_USER
```
